QuestData.Title: Defend the Stand
QuestData.Description: Despite our substantial successes in the lower third of Zul'Drak, we must still face the onslaught of the Scourge. Such is the way in this frigid hell.$B$BThe attacks are unrelenting, yet my men need rest. If you are willing, we could use your aid in reinforcing them.$B$BBelow in the courtyard you'll find no end to the fighting. Dispatch the Scourge there with all the zeal you can muster, $c.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Falstaav has tasked you with the destruction of any 10 Scourge in the courtyard at The Argent Stand.
QuestData.CompletionText: Perhaps you could destroy a few more?
QuestData.RewardText: Your assistance in this matter is greatly appreciated. Were it not for your efforts, we would have difficulty in holding the unliving back from our steps.

Objectives.Objective: Scourge at The Argent Stand destroyed
